entry.title: yeole-rohan/ray-content-editor: This is a lightweight, extensible, and user-friendly content editor built with pure JavaScript. It supports rich text editing, inline code, code blocks with syntax styling, tooltips, and a fully integrated emoji picker.
entry.content: This is a lightweight, extensible, and user-friendly content editor built with pure JavaScript. It supports rich text editing, inline code, code blocks with syntax styling, tooltips, and a fully integrated emoji picker.

entry.title: lainbo/fullpage-monaco-editor: A lightweight full-screen Monaco Editor implementation that supports configuring the editor via URL parameters. It can display a regular editor or a diff (comparison) editor.
entry.content: A lightweight full-screen Monaco Editor implementation that supports configuring the editor via URL parameters. It can display a regular editor or a diff (comparison) editor.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
entry.content: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

entry.title: mcvnh/feed-eater: A lightweight RSS feed aggregator built with Nuxt, deployed on Cloudflare with NuxtHub to provide a free, on-the-fly RSS reader.
entry.content: A lightweight RSS feed aggregator built with Nuxt, deployed on Cloudflare with NuxtHub to provide a free, on-the-fly RSS reader.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...
entry.content: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...

entry.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
entry.content: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

entry.title: muhammadhamzakhan22/element-essentials: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
entry.content: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: ven-123/venwikiapp: A lightweight and user-friendly application that allows users to search Wikipedia articles using the Wikipedia API, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project helped strengthen my understanding of working with external APIs, asynchronous JavaScript (fetch, promises), and building dynamic UIs
entry.content: A lightweight and user-friendly application that allows users to search Wikipedia articles using the Wikipedia API, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project helped strengthen my understanding of working with external APIs, asynchronous JavaScript (fetch, promises), and building dynamic UIs

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
entry.content: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
